params.tokenAmounts: Array of token amounts to claim

returns.canClaim: Whether dev tokens can be claimed
returns.reason: Reason if cannot claim (0=can claim, 1=not finalized, 2=already claimed, 3=no allocation)

returns.canClaim: Whether liquidity tokens can be claimed
returns.reason: Reason if cannot claim (0=can claim, 1=not finalized, 2=already claimed, 3=no allocation)

params.giveawayId: ID of the giveaway to cancel

params.usdcAmount: Amount of project USDC to use for liquidity pairing

createGiveaway(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Self.xyz verification is always required for all giveaways

params.devPercentage: Percentage of tokens for developer (in basis points, e.g., 1000 = 10%)
params.liquidityPercentage: Percentage of tokens for liquidity pool (in basis points, e.g., 3000 = 30%)
params.maxAllocation: Maximum USDC allocation for the giveaway
params.tokenAddress: Address of the token being given away

params.giveawayId: ID of the giveaway to finalize

getConfigId(bytes32,bytes32,bytes).details: Override Self.xyz getConfigId function to return our verification configuration

returns._0: Configuration ID for this verification request

returns.devPercentage: Percentage allocated to dev (in basis points)
returns.devTokensAllocated: Amount of tokens allocated to dev
returns.devTokensClaimed: Amount of tokens claimed by dev

returns.liquidityPercentage: Percentage allocated to liquidity (in basis points)
returns.liquidityTokensAllocated: Amount of tokens allocated to liquidity
returns.liquidityTokensClaimed: Amount of tokens claimed for liquidity

returns.tokenPrice: Price per token in USDC (with 6 decimals)

params.claimIndex: Index of the claim to check

params.claimIndex: Unique index for this claim in the merkle tree
params.participant: Address of the participant claiming tokens
params.refundAmount: Amount of USDC to refund (if any)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerPassportVerification(uint256,uin.details: Legacy function for manual registration (for testing/migration)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMerkleRoot(uint256,bytes32).details: Can only be called by project owner after giveaway is finalized

params.merkleRoot_: Merkle root containing all participant allocations

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.devPercentage: Percentage of tokens for developer (in basis points)
params.liquidityPercentage: Percentage of tokens for liquidity pool (in basis points)

returns.isValid: Whether the allocation parameters are valid
returns.reason: Reason if invalid (0=valid, 1=dev too high, 2=liquidity too high, 3=liquidity below 20% minimum, 4=combined too high)

DEFAULT_V3_TICK_UPPER().notice: Default upper tick for full-range Uniswap V3 positions

MIN_LIQUIDITY_PERCENTAGE().notice: Minimum liquidity percentage for healthy trading (20%)

PLATFORM_FEE().notice: Platform fee percentage (in basis points, e.g., 250 = 2.5%)

TOKEN_DECIMALS().notice: Standard token decimals (18 decimals is the ERC20 standard)

UNISWAP_V2_FACTORY().notice: Uniswap V2 Factory contract address (for liquidity deployment)

UNISWAP_V2_ROUTER().notice: Uniswap V2 Router contract address (for liquidity deployment)
